item.description:
For all our French speaking members.... And those who like a suspenseful story. After the movie we'll head out to Tommy Doyle's for a bite to eat, some adult beverages and to discuss reactions to the movie.

 

"AN ENERGETICALLY DIRECTED ADRENALINE-PUMPER, replete with fierce shoot-outs, mad metro chases and one very tough delivery." -J. Hoberman, Village Voice

 

"Point Blank is a slick, high adrenaline action film in the tradition of such hits as Taken and Tell No One. Gilles Lellouche stars as Samuel, a nurse working at a Paris hospital when his pregnant wife (Elena Anaya) is kidnapped before his very eyes. Knocked unconscious, he comes to and discovers that a dangerous criminal named Sartet (Roschdy Zem) is responsible, and if he's ever to see his wife again, he must do Sartet's bidding. Samuel quickly finds himself pitted against rival gangsters and trigger-happy police in a deadly race to save the lives of his wife and unborn child. Also starring Gerard Lanvin. (Fully subtitled).  "

 

 

Movie web site:  http://www.pointblankmovie.com/

 

"MAKE A NOTE TO SEE IT. YOU WON’T BE DISAPPOINTED. Propulsively entertaining." -Steven Schaefer, Boston Herald
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the lobby near the big staircase. Please try to be early.
item.name: Point Blank (movie)
